description:
Join millions who love Wattpad - the world’s unlimited, ever growing library of FREE stories. 

RANKED IN TOP 5 BOOKS APPS FOR 3 YEARS! 

• Pick from over 20 million FREE stories: the best of sci-fi, fantasy, mystery, romance, action thrillers, and more
• Write, Read, Comment, Chat with Readers and Writers and Vote 
• Works offline
• Synchronize your Wattpad library between your phone, tablet and web
• Connect with your favorite writers, including Margaret Atwood, Paulo Coelho, and thousands of aspiring writers from across the globe
• Get story updates directly from authors and customize your reading settings to personalize your experience 
• Read popular stories by classic authors; Moby Dick, Alice in Wonderland, Sherlock Holmes, The Art of War, by Sun Tzu, The Marvelous Land of Oz, Tales from Shakespeare, Romeo & Juliet, Pride & Prejudice and more
• Create and Read fanfiction about Anime, such as Naruto, and the Supernatural, such as Werewolves, Vampires Diaries, Twilight, 1D / One Direction, Lucy Hale, Harry Styles, Supernatural, Kathniel, Kpop, and more

Reviews: 

Wattpad has been featured in publications like The New York Times, MacWorld, The Guardian and Washington Post. Here’s what people are saying: 

"Wattpad opens the doors and enlarges the view in places where the doors are closed and the view is restricted." - Margaret Atwood 
"Wattpad is exciting because there is the opportunity to create content with depth." - Vincent Lam 
"Connecting readers and writers — Publishers need to establish a direct relationship with their customers, and this is something Wattpad excels at."
- O'Reilly Media
"I love Wattpad!!" - Thousands of App Store reviews 

Already love Wattpad? 

What are you waiting for? Download our app! 

Connect with us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/wattpad) and Follow Wattpad on Twitter (www.twitter.com/wattpad).
trackCensoredName: Wattpad - Free Books and eBook Reader - Read Fiction, Romance, Fanfiction stories
trackName: Wattpad - Free Books and eBook Reader - Read Fiction, Romance, Fanfiction stories
releaseNotes:
- Typing @ in a comment will let you auto-complete with another user’s name to create a link to that user.
- You can tap on user names mentioned in comments with an @ to visit their profile.
- Fixed some layout issues on iPhone 6 and 6+ (full size support coming soon!).
- We've cut the size of the app by nearly half. Updating to new versions should be faster and you'll get back some space on your device after updating to this version.
